content: textures abound in this plush crochet throw from bernat blanket with alternating sections of horizontal ribbing and a subtle bobble texture this minimalist blanket is thick and cushy and perfect for cuddling the simple stitchwork offers just enough variation to keep you interested while still allowing for a relaxing make practice half_double_crochet in the 3rd loop half_double_crochet slip_stitch double_crochet single_crochet simple color changes and more materials bernat® blanket™ 21 2 oz/600 g 431 yds/394 m contrast a almond 58049 2 balls or 661 yds/604 5 m contrast b spring grass 58051 2 balls or 732 yds/669 5 m measurements approx 49¾ 126 5 cm x 60½ 153 5 cm
